mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chamgosu.CG_MARSTERGOODS( MG_ISBN, MG_BOOKNM, MG_BOOKSUBNM, MG_PBS, MG_BOOKWRITER, MG_PRICE, MG_SUBJECT, MG_OBJECT, MG_GRADE, MG_STEP, MG_BOOKISYEAR, MG_MOREINF, MG_REFMAT, MG_USERID, MG_APPLYCHK, MG_BOOKIMG, REGDATE )VALUES( #{MG_ISBN}, #{MG_BOOKNM}, #{MG_BOOKSUBNM}, #{MG_PBS}, #{MG_BOOKWRITER}, #{MG_PRICE}, #{MG_SUBJECT}, #{MG_OBJECT}, #{MG_GRADE}, #{MG_STEP}, #{MG_BOOKISYEAR}, #{MG_MOREINF}, #{MG_REFMAT}, #{MG_USERID}, #{MG_APPLYCHK}, #{MG_BOOKIMG}, CURDATE() )
mapper.select: select MG_SEQ ,MG_ISBN ,MG_BOOKNM ,BSN_NM ,UDF_SELECT_CODE1NAME('02', MG_PBS) as MG_PBS ,MG_BOOKWRITER ,MG_PRICE ,MG_SUBJECT ,MG_OBJECT ,MG_GRADE ,MG_STEP ,MG_BOOKISYEAR ,MG_USERID ,MG_APPLYCHK ,MG_BOOKIMG ,DATE_FORMAT( REGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d' ) as REGDATE from ( select MG_SEQ ,MG_ISBN ,MG_BOOKNM ,MG_PBS ,MG_BOOKWRITER ,MG_PRICE ,MG_SUBJECT ,MG_OBJECT ,MG_GRADE ,MG_STEP ,MG_BOOKISYEAR ,MG_USERID ,MG_APPLYCHK ,MG_BOOKIMG ,S.BSN_NM ,REGDATE , @rnum := @rnum + 1 as rn from (SELECT @rnum := 0) r, CG_MARSTERGOODS M LEFT JOIN CG_BOOKSUBNM S ON M.MG_SEQ = S.BSN_BOOK where 1=1 order by REGDATE desc ) as list where list.rn between #{start} and #{end}
